sentences.sContent: the underlying causes of her depression
There is an underlying assumption that younger workers are easier to train.
sentences.sCn: 有一种潜在的假设，认为年轻一些的雇员容易培训。

synos.tran: 潜在的；根本的；在下面的；优先的

phrases.pCn: 标的资产；基础资产；相关/指定资产
[金融]标的证券；附属公司证券

trans.tranCn: 潜在的；根本的；在下面的；优先的
trans.tranOther: the cause, idea etc that is the most important, although it is not easily noticed

trans.tranCn: 放在…的下面；为…的基础；优先于（underlie的ing形式）
